entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Trois-Rivières Airport 5:44 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
